concept.title: Configuring Directory Properties
concept.shortdesc: When you configure the Directory origin, configure the general properties, including the file type. Then, configure the properties based on the file type.delete this topic and rename/promote the different groups of properties?

conbody.p: The Directory properties display on the following tabs in the Properties panel:

ul.li: General. Configuration properties for all file types.
Log Files. Properties for log files.
JSON Files. Properties for JSON files.
Delimited Files. Properties for delimited files, such as comma-separated or tab-separated files.
